Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
This summer will be a pretty busy one, which is unusual for me. Iâ€™m taking a summer class, directly after which Iâ€™m headed to California for Anime Expo 2011 and to catch up with my significant other (being 800 miles apart sucks).

After that, thereâ€™s a month of watching anime and playing games until school starts. I probably wonâ€™t be as dedicated a watcher as you, though. I think the only stuff Iâ€™ll be watching is Steins;Gate and Deadman Wonderland (which I need to catch up on) unless someone can convince me to watch any of the other shows coming out.

This past week Iâ€™ve pretty much been doing nothing but Mortal Kombat 9 (lol dial-a-combos, game has no sense of timing and pisses me off, but thereâ€™s something about it) and Borderlands (old by now, but girlfriend wants me to play it!). Probably wonâ€™t be buying anything until Skyrim or Uncharted 3, and they both come out long after summer. /sigh

Good luck doing all you plan to do! I hope those RB customs come along well. Itâ€™s awesome that youâ€™re looking into them.
